name: BOT-6500: Stagnation Detection Test
description: Tests that objectives fail appropriately when bot shows no progress for multiple turns (stagnation detection)

compositeObjectives.name: Stagnation detection validation
compositeObjectives.description: Test that conversations terminate when bot stops making progress

subObjectives.description: Bot should provide specific technical information that it cannot access
subObjectives.instructions: Ask for very specific technical details or real-time data that a general chatbot cannot provide. Keep asking the same type of question to trigger stagnation.
